resources:
I challenge you!
Who began directing with "Grand Theft Auto" (1977) and won his first Best Director Oscar for "A Beautiful Mind" (2001)? Steven Spielberg Ron Howard/// Mel Gibson George Lucas
Which English duo had hits between 1984 and 1987 that included West End Girls, Opportunities (Let\'s Make Lots of Money), Love Comes Quickly, Suburbia, It\'s a Sin, What Have I Done to Deserve This?, Rent and Always on My Mind? Cheap Trick Eurythmics Pet Shop Boys/// Black \'n Blue
Who of his family joined Louis XVI of France in going to the guillotine in 1793? His daughter His brother His mother-in-law His wife///
What is the name of the tallest structure ever built? Burj Khalifa CN Tower Grollo Tower/// Taipei 101
Who is the only British Prime Minister to have received the Nobel Prize in Literature? Anthony Eden Clement Attlee Harold Macmillan/// Sir Winston Churchill
One of the tools proposed in detecting skin cancer is called what? Molelist Molechart Molegraph Molemap///
What word or phrase originates from the practice on the classical stage of introducing a god from above to effect a speedy denouement? Photokineticism Mon dieu et mon droit Daguerreotype Deus ex machina///
For which of the following disciplines is Nobel Prize awarded?(MORE THEN ONE ANSWER) Physics Math Economics Chemistry
Jamaica is closest to which state in the U.S.? Write your answer here
What colour is a NYC taxi? Write your answer here///Florida
submit reset
